name: Garmin Forerunner 745 Smartwatch - Unisex
description: Combining advanced training tools with smartwatch functionality, Garmin’s newest Forerunner isn’t just for training, it’s for living. Onboard GPS and other sensors track speed and distance, turning your movement into data, helping you train smarter. Because how you train isn’t the only factor in your performance, the 745 also looks at where you train. Elevation and temperature are taken into consideration and layered onto performance data. The Elevate™ optical heart rate monitor takes your pulse right from your wrist. When paired with the Garmin Connect™ app, your 745 goes from a training tool, to an everyday tool. Connect lets you review activities, receive notifications, access music apps, track weather and more. And, if you leave your phone at home, the 745 has the soundtrack covered, with storage for hundreds of songs and podcasts.Modes for biking, running, swimming, multisport and brick workouts – transition between activities with thee press of a button.Daily suggested workouts based on your current training load and training status.Garmin Coach provides free, personalized training plans to improve your 10k, half marathon, or just to train smarter.Download or create training plans in Garmin Connect, or sync training plans from other apps, e.g. TrainingPeaks®, TrainerRoad, etc.Listen to music over Bluetooth®, download playlists and podcasts via Spotify®, Amazon Music or Deezer (premium account may be required).Playlists synced from streaming services update when in range of Wi-Fi.Holds up to 500 songs.ClimbPro™ mode breaks down climbs to show grade, total ascent, and elevation profile.Strava Segment integration (requires premium) preloaded or on-the-fly through your phone, shows starred segments and instantaneous results as segments end.Body Battery™ tracks daily energy levels, monitoring what drains your energy (exercise) and recharges your energy (rest, food, etc.), giving you a better idea of how and when to train.Garmin Pay™ contact-less payment (if supported by your bank).Elevate™ optical heart rate monitor has a red LED for Pulse Ox data that works while swimming.Physiological metrics includes VO2 max, a race predictor, recovery advisor and performance indicator.Training load uses data from your past week’s workouts to let you know if you are overtraining, under-training, or on the right path.Compatible with running dynamics sensors (sold separately).LiveTrack™ (through a connected phone) allows you to share your location and fitness data.Incident detection sends an alert via phone to your emergency contacts in case of accident.Assistance mode sends out a message with a LiveTrack link, letting your contacts know where you are.Connects to satellite constellations (GPS, GLONASS and Galileo) and caches positions for fast, strong connectionsUltraTrac™ mode reduces GPS recording rate to conserve battery.24/7 activity tracking learns your activity level and guides you towards a more active lifestyle.On board sleep tracking mode monitors  rest, breathing patterns, total sleep hours and periods of restful sleep.Automatically syncs data to paired phone running Garmin Connect.Connects with ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart sensors, from foot pods, to speed and cadence pods, to power meters.Connect IQ support allows you to download apps, templates, data fields, watch faces, and other features.Internal GPS provides basic waypoint navigation.Back to start feature directs you (as the crow flies) to where you started your activity.
